org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller

Class ArticleCrudController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller.abstr.RestController
      • org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller.abstr.DoiBasedCrudController
        • org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller.abstr.ArticleSpaceController
          • org.ambraproject.rhino.rest.controller.ArticleCrudController

  • @Controller
public class ArticleCrudController
extends ArticleSpaceController
    Controller for _c_reate, _r_ead, _u_pdate, and _d_elete operations on article entities and files.

      • create

        @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Throwable.class)

      • read

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
@RequestMapping(value="/articles/**",
                method=GET)
public void read(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                     @RequestParam(value="comments",required=false)
                                     String comments,
                                     @RequestParam(value="authors",required=false)
                                     String authors,
                                     @RequestParam(value="excludeCitations",required=false)
                                     boolean excludeCitations)
          throws org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException,
                 IOException
        Retrieves either metadata about an article (default), or entities associated with an article depending on the parameters.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest
        response - HttpServletResponse
        comments - if present, the response will be a list of objects representing comments associated with the article, instead of the article metadata. Each comment has a "replies" list that contains any replies (recursively).
        authors - if present, the response will be a list of objects representing the authors of the article. While the article metadata contains author names, this list will contain more author information than the article metadata, such as author affiliations, corresponding author, etc.
        Throws:
        org.ambraproject.filestore.FileStoreException
        IOException

      • delete
